Function Documentation

template<class T>
int MaxN (  int  n,
T *  values
) 
 

Finds the maximum value among n values. It uses an O(N) algorithm to find it and returns the index of the maximum value in the array. Each entry must support at least the > operator.

Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.usp.br)

Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)

Definition at line 380 of file stUtil.h.

bool TriangularInequality (  stDistance  ab,
stDistance  ac,
stDistance  bc
)  [inline]
 

Tests the triangular inequality.

Parameters:
ab Distance between A and B.
ac Distance between A and C.
bc Distance between B and C.
Returns:
True if the 3 distaces don't break the triangular inequality.
Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.usp.br)

Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)
